A place for independent writing

Start a newsletter. Build your community. Make
money from subscriptions.

Publishing is free, with no limits. We only make
money when you do.

Who writes on Substack?

Emily Oster

writes about pregnancy and parenting data on ParentData

Matt Stoller

writes about the politics of monopoly on BIG

writes about what she's into on books/snacks/softcore

writes about everyday faith in her Field Notes

writes about underestimated founders on Lolita's Newsletter

Henry Abbot

writes about basketball on TrueHoop


Browse top writers



You're in charge

Your email list is your community. When you start a Substack, you get:

  • Your own email list
  • A website for all your posts
  • Community features
  • Audio, video, images, GIFs, and more
  • Control over what's free and what's only for your paid subscribers

It takes less than a minute to get started.



Start publishing


Get paid to do what you love

Build your audience on Substack, or bring them over. When you're ready, you can add paid subscriptions.

We take care of the details so you can focus on writing. Top writers on Substack make hundreds of thousands of dollars a year.



Learn more

—JP Brammer, ¡Hola Papi!
